channel.title: commanigy – Peter Theill Site
channel.description: What’s going on in the personal life of Peter Theill

item.title: ShoutSMS updated to latest Rails version
item.dc:creator: Peter
item.description:
I just upgraded my ShoutSMS service since Microsoft chose to use it for their Microsoft Inspire event this summer. It’s a great project allowing people to send out bulk sms using their own phone number. It’s a nice feature if you want to get immediate feedback on dispatched messages such as follow-up questions or similar.

The post ShoutSMS updated to latest Rails version appeared first on Peter Theill Site.
item.content:encoded:
I just upgraded my ShoutSMS service since Microsoft chose to use it for their Microsoft Inspire event this summer.

It’s a great project allowing people to send out bulk sms using their own phone number. It’s a nice feature if you want to get immediate feedback on dispatched messages such as follow-up questions or similar.

The post ShoutSMS updated to latest Rails version appeared first on Peter Theill Site.
